overview: Talking about the difference in appearance and dark skin color, the horse unknowingly makes a horse and evaluates their race and the whole nation at a low price. The main character, Muhammad, is a migrant worker from a diving king on a beach in Southeast Asia. A television program that went to Southeast Asia in search of the diving king introduces Muhammad, but ironically, he is a migrant worker in Korea. One day, Muhammad went to the bathroom to escape the crackdown, and watched a program introducing himself on TV.
title: Muhammad, The Hermit King
